flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • 5v 250ohm reed relay, 3x LEDS, 10kohm< resistor, 2n 3904 transitor, 560ohm resistor 5mw laser, push button switch, wire, 9v battery clip, 9v battery
Tools
  • Soldering iron, solder, wire cutter and stripper

parts.text: 5v 250ohm reed relay, 3x LEDS, 10kohm< resistor, 2n 3904 transitor, 560ohm resistor 5mw laser, push button switch, wire, 9v battery clip, 9v battery

guide.summary: A Cheap simple laser trip wire that, when triped, activates leds and can power a 9v device.
guide.title: Make a Laser Trip Wire!

tools.text: Soldering iron, solder, wire cutter and stripper
